name: RushHell
description:
RushHell is a dungeon crawler in which you control up to 4 heros at the same time in fighting arenas. You have to survive and kill all the enemies to advance to next level.

The game was made during the VimJam 3 https://itch.io/jam/vimjam3 . Where the focus is "Multi-use ". The focus was used as "multi used controls" and also "multiple instances of a game".

This is my first game ever and it is in a prototype state. Especially range mobs and better AI are the next target.

Controls:

  • ARROW KEYS : to move
  • SPACE : to attack / use ability

Assets used:

-Characters and tiles from https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset

-Projectiles from https://nyknck.itch.io/pixelarteffectfx017 

-Background from https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/6554435-realistic-fire-flame-with-horizontal...
